programme.title: Innocence
programme.desc: A hotshot lawyer uncovers the conspiracy of a small village while defending her estranged mother, who has Alzheimer's disease and accused of killing the attendees at her husband’s funeral.

programme.title: Boys Be!
programme.desc: When two high school friends – the best fighter in school and the other who hates physical conflict – get involved in a fight involving local mobsters, they discover the true meaning of friendship.

programme.title: Hard Hit
programme.desc: On his way to work with his kids, a man received a mysterious call claiming he's sitting on a bomb that will go off if he gets out of his seat.

programme.title: The Battleship Island
programme.desc: During the colonial rule of Japan, around 400 Koreans are conscripted into slave labor on Hashima Island. As the island’s dark secrets are revealed, the Korean labourers plot to escape.

programme.title: The Tower
programme.desc: On Christmas Eve at an ultra-luxurious building complex, a White Christmas party is held to dazzle its equally high-end tenants and VIP guests. It takes a horrific turn when a fire breaks out.

programme.title: The Magician
programme.desc: A talented young magician falls for a princess betrothed to his former teacher, leading to a fierce showdown between the two powerful magicians.

programme.title: Sinkhole
programme.desc: As the family celebrates their purchases of a new condo after 11 years of effort, the building was engulfed in a sinkhole due to heavy downpour.

programme.title: The Witch: Part 2. The Other One
programme.desc: A mysterious girl survived a blood raid in a secret lab found herself being tracked down by a group of assassins.

programme.title: Hwayi: A Monster Boy
programme.desc: A boy raised by five fathers attached to the criminal world is about to discover the sinister truth about his past when he is forced to pull the trigger when he tags along with his fathers on a job.

programme.title: Mr. Housewife
programme.desc: A dad enjoys his daily chores and taking care of his daughter at home. But when he faces financial trouble, he joins a TV game show to win the jackpot while pretending to be a housewife.

programme.title: The Tenor - Lirico Spinto
programme.desc: A strong partnership and friendship begins when a talented Korean vocalist met a Japanese music producer. At the peak of his career, he was diagnosed with thyroid cancer and might loss his voice...

programme.title: Stellar: A Magical Ride
programme.desc: Chasing after a supercar in his father's beat-up Stellar, while being come after by local gangsters, Young Bae jog memories of his father bit by bit.

programme.title: Very Ordinary Couple
programme.desc: A couple working in the same bank broke up but continue to see each other in workplace. They couldn't help but pay attention to each other even more than they were dating...

programme.title: The Exclusive: Beat The Devil'S Tattoo
programme.desc: When a journalist discovers that his exclusive story on a serial killer was based on false information, he fabricates more lies to cover his mistake.

programme.title: Spiritwalker
programme.desc: A man loses memory and wakes up in a new body every 12 hours. In search of his identity, he met a woman who claims to know him.

programme.title: 200 Pounds Beauty
programme.desc: A timid, overweight and under-appreciated back-up singer resorts to drastic "head-to-toe" plastic surgery to become a pop diva.

programme.title: Soar Into The Sun
programme.desc: An elite combat pilot carries a rescue mission to his missing teammate while facing threats from the north.

programme.title: 1987: When The Day Comes
programme.desc: In 1987, a pro-democracy student activist was captured and tortured to death by the police. The authorities tried to cover up the case, but the ordinary people fight to reveal the truth.

programme.title: Deliver Us From Evil
programme.desc: A retired contract killer investigates a kidnapping case which may involve his next of kin, all the while relentlessly chased by his last target’s blood brother.

programme.title: Hard Hit
programme.desc: On his way to work with his kids, a man received a mysterious call claiming he's sitting on a bomb that will go off if he gets out of his seat.

programme.title: Steal My Heart
programme.desc: Hot-shot police detective Lee is out to get a hit-and-run driver and discovers the driver is his long-lost girlfriend from ten years ago. He tries to protect her before her crime record accumulates.

programme.title: The Odd Family: Zombie On Sale

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep45334534

programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep883884
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1774
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1978
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3531
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: New Taiwan Go (M) Ep2540
programme.desc: Depth analysis of the day breaking news headlines to restore the truth inside

programme.title: iWalker-Moving Kitchen (M) Ep376
programme.desc: Tuesday "iWalker" has been upgraded and changed the name into "iWalker-Moving Kitchen". James and the pretty chef, Rachel will move to different province with the mobile kitchen which costs more than 2 million NTD, and introduce to the audience the unique taste of the province.

programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep885886
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep45344535
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1978
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep45354536
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1979
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Like That Also Can (M) Ep3
programme.desc:
We are " Jiangplay " challenge, we are " Jiangplay " experience, understanding life and fun! So, get out of your comfort zone, break through your echo chamber!
“Jiangplay” is an all new social media and reality show that our hosts experience, take on challenges by gathering trendie, old school, hippie and sub-cultures, creating unexpected fun and an all new impression on learning, giving you resonating inspiration and rush in each episode.

programme.title: Leio
programme.desc: An ex-singer Kao returns to his hometown for a funeral and takes part in a water drilling contest to save his drought-stricken hometown, as well as to win a million dollar cash prize. However, what Kao and other contestants do not realize is that there is a fierce and deadly beast lurking underground who wants to eat them all!

programme.title: Two Tigers
programme.desc: This crime comedy is about a bumbling young man Fang Nan, who kidnaps a middle-aged businessman Zhang Cheng Gong for ransom. However, the captor becomes the captive when Zhang turns the tables on Fang and forces him to complete three tasks. The two men soon find themselves sharing a journey filled with absurdity and deception.

programme.title: The White Storm
programme.desc: Three Narcotics Bureau officers who are good friends get involved in a case with the drug lord. When the operation fails, they must make a devastating decision - two can live, but one must die. Five years later, the two vow to take revenge but end up competing against each other for their own lives. Will brotherhood be sacrificed again?

programme.title: My Alien Girlfriend
programme.desc: When Angela arrives from another planet in search of her brother, fate has her unexpectedly meet handsome veterinarian Tian Yi, who risks himself to save her every time she gets into trouble. Though she is no believer of love, his actions eventually move her…

programme.title: Look Up
programme.desc: This film celebrates the 25th anniversary of Hong Kong’s Handover in a series of four cultural stories about young Hong Kongers from different walks of life: a young man with autism pursuing his dream, a reconciliation between father and son, a Chinese opera star helping young pop singers, and a Nepali youth becoming a professional lion dancer.

programme.title: Detective Chinatown 2
programme.desc: Qin Feng was tricked by Tang Ran to participate in the "World Detective Contest" in New York's Chinatown. Their task is to find the murderer of the grandson of Godfather, Uncle Qi. When famous detectives from all over the world investigate the case, two other cases occurred with a very similar modus operandi…

programme.title: I'm Livin' It
programme.desc: Once a successful banker, Bowen now spends his nights in a 24-hour fast food joint where he meets a group of homeless people. Together they strive to get themselves out of rock bottom.

programme.title: A Cool Fish
programme.desc: In this dark-comedy, cop-turned-security guard Ma faces the ultimate challenge when his boss mysteriously disappears and his paralyzed sister makes a morbid deal with the armed bandits who abduct her.

programme.title: Winner Takes All
programme.desc: Two private detectives want to gain fame by solving a series of robberies. However, they were fooled by the King of Thieves during the investigation. It was later discovered that all the robberies were related to a Japanese businessman, Miyamoto. Who is the real King of Thieves?

programme.title: Touch of the Light
programme.desc: A blind but talented pianist Siang encounters an unrecognized but skilful dancer Chieh. Chieh is attracted to the courageous Siang while Siang is fascinated by the adventurous Chieh. Their friendship grows as Siang and Chieh pursue their dreams together. Sandrine Pinna was awarded Best Actress for her role as Chieh in the 2012 Taipei Film Festival.

programme.title: Days of Being Wild
programme.desc: Yuddy is an orphan who is callous towards any women who falls for him. One day, Yuddy sets out on a fateful journey to Philippines to meet with his mother, but the trip ended up disheartening him again.

programme.title: The Fatal Raid
programme.desc: Twenty years after a deadly bloodbath between the Hong Kong Police and Macau gangsters, Madam Fong, the surviving team member, leads a new squad of four policewomen across borders to pursue young anarchists terrorizing Macau in a mission to protect the Hong Kong Police’s Deputy Chief Commissioner.

programme.title: The Way We Dance
programme.desc: Tofu shop girl Fleur possesses a quirky gift for hip hop and dance which she uses to becomes a supernova in the university dance crew. Meanwhile, Alan, from the Tai Chi Club has an eye for Fleur's sleight of hand and tries to recruit her into his club.

programme.title: Kung Fu Monster
programme.desc: In the Ming Dynasty, the Bruneian Empire offers a monster as a gift to the nation. Imperial guard Ocean is tasked to train it, but realizing it is a kind creature by nature, he releases it secretly so that it will not become a killing beast. His action prompts a frenzy hunt for the monster when the palace puts a hefty bounty for its return…

programme.title: Wine War
programme.desc: A Chinese wine expert residing in France is contacted by his childhood buddy in China to help him bid for a famous bottle of vintage wine in an auction. Little did he realize he is about to enter an age-old feud between rivaling vineyards and discover a historical mystery that might shatter the whole wine industry.

programme.title: The Empty Hands
programme.desc: Mari Hirakawa inherits her father’s dojo after his death but wants to sell it as she does not want to run the karate practice. For her plan to succeed, she has to take on a bet with his father’s ex-student and compete in a martial arts competition that will change her life.

programme.title: Blind War
programme.desc: Former SWAT captain Dong Gu suffers traumatic visual loss during a failed mission for which he is forced to take responsibility. He manages to get over and adapt to the situation with his daughter’s company, until his nemesis appears and puts his daughter in danger. Despite being blind, Dong Gu must fight to save his daughter.

programme.title: House of Flying Daggers
programme.desc: During Tang Dynasty, two police deputies are tasked to catch the new leader of a revolutionary faction known as the House of Flying Daggers. They capture a blind dancer suspected of being the daughter of the ex-leader but both fall in love with her. When passion turns into hatred and loyalty turns into betrayal, love will be the deadliest weapon!

programme.title: 12 Golden Ducks
programme.desc: This is a comeback story about the misadventures of a group of gigolos, led by Future, trying to make their mark in Hong Kong. As with any profession, they have their share of setbacks, but their ability to find laughter within the tears reflects the drive, passion and the indomitable spirit of the Hong Kong people.

programme.title: Casino Tycoon
programme.desc: Inspired by the story of Macau’s Casino King Stanley Ho, the movie traces his blood-splattered fight to the top from 1930s to 1960s. In 1941, a young graduate, Benny Ho, flees Hong Kong during the Japanese invasion and heads for Macau. Benny starts as a labourer but rises to the top of the city’s casino business with his courage, wisdom and diligence.

programme.title: Septet: The Story of Hong Kong
programme.desc: Seven of Hong Kong's most revered directors, all with distinctly unique styles, come together for the first time to compose a symphony of stories for their city from the 50s to the future.

programme.title: She's a Man. He's a Woman.
programme.desc: This is a romantic comedy about a quarrelsome and loving couple whose spirits are being swapped over after a thunderstorm. The sexy lady finds herself carrying an ugly man’s spirit, and vice versa. Can they switch their spirits back, or do they need to get use to the situation for the rest of their lives?

programme.title: Enter the Fat Dragon
programme.desc: Donnie Yen plays a Hong Kong police officer who is highly skilled in martial arts but balloons to more than 200 pounds after his fiancé left him. His boss can only assign simple tasks to him like escorting a criminal to Japan, but can he complete it?

programme.title: Wolf Warrior II
programme.desc: In this action-packed sequel to the 2015 blockbuster hit, China’s deadliest Special Forces operative, Leng Feng (Wu Jing), returns into action when he crosses paths with a sadistic band of mercenaries terrorizing innocent civilians.

programme.title: Painted Faces
programme.desc: This is based on the real-life story of Master Yu Jim Yuen who strives to run his academy in the 1960s, even as the opera culture is declining. Three young men, Sammo Hung, Jackie Chan and Yuen Biao, are determined to train under Master Yu and undergo extremely tough training before they become three of Hong Kong’s biggest stars

programme.title: Genghis Khan
programme.desc: Before he became the great Khan he was known as Temüjin, and was deeply in love with his childhood sweetheart Börte. News of Temüjin's father's death disrupted their relationship and as Temüjin heads back home, he faces a sudden attack from his father's former comrades, causing his whole tribe to be destroyed.

programme.title: Manhunt
programme.desc: In this movie directed by John Woo, lawyer Du goes on the run after he is framed for a murder. Veteran detective Yamura suspects the case to be more complicated than it seems, and while he understands Du better during the hunt, Yamura still doubts his innocence. Is the real killer lurking elsewhere? Is there a hidden conspiracy behind the murder?

programme.title: Fallen Angels
programme.desc: The funkier cousin to Chungking Express, director Wong Kar Wai looks at five fallen angels who suffer love and loss amidst the crime and chaos of Hong Kong’s neon nights. Karen Mok won Best Supporting Actress in the 15th Hong Kong Film Awards for her remarkable role as a broken-hearted party girl.

programme.title: Mrs K
programme.desc: Mrs K is a housewife living with her family. When a stranger uses her dark history to blackmail her, Mrs K is forced to face an old enemy to save her family.

programme.title: Mahjong Heroes
programme.desc: A hero helps a young student defect a cunning, malicious gambling tycoon who is out to take over the family business, over the game of mahjong.

programme.title: Fatal Visit
programme.desc: Yanny leaves Hong Kong for San Jose to visit her old friend Ling. Ling and her husband Tang seems to live an ideal and carefree life. However, during her five-day stay, Yanny uncovers the truth behind the façade as she reveals the unspeakable secrets that will propel all three down a fatal path of destruction.

programme.title: Bodyguards and Assassins
programme.desc: On 15 October 1906, Chinese revolutionary leader Sun Yat Sen returned to Hong Kong to stage another overthrow of the Qing dynasty. Businessman Lee and Chinese Daily’s Chief Chan arrange for five bodyguards to protect Mr Sun - these are all extraordinary fighters who are ready and up for fierce battles against the Qing assassination army.

programme.title: The Deadly Duo
programme.desc: The prince of the Sung Dynasty is captured by the Chin invaders and is guarded by top martial arts masters. It is up to two powerful patriots to fight the overwhelming odds and pull off the impossible: to rescue the royal Prince and get out of the Chin stronghold alive.

programme.title: Diau Charn
programme.desc: In the Han Dynasty, the tyrannical Prime Minister Dong Zuo takes control of the country, so Minister Wang plots to take him down using Diau Charn’s beauty. Wang arranges for her to be Dong’s concubine as he knows Dong’s adopted son Lu Bu is in love with her, turning them against each other. Lu Bu ends up killing Dong Zuo to be with Diau Charn.

programme.title: The Master
programme.desc: Gao Jian is the disciple of the martial arts master Shi but is constantly being punished by his master for no reason. One day, Gao accidentally saves his master’s rival Jin, so Jin teaches him his unique martial arts skill in return. However, Master Shi sees this as Gao’s betrayal…

programme.title: Village Of Tigers
programme.desc: The devilish residents of the Village of Tigers, led by Hu Jiao, plan to kill Lo Hong Shun, otherwise known as the heroic Sword of the Southern Sky. Hu Jiao sees a way to use the righteousness of the honorable Ba family to help him kill the hero Lo by turning them against him. Will good prevail over evil?

programme.title: A Friend From Inner Space
programme.desc: A young boy whose parents are separated tries to find happiness in life. One day, he meets and befriends a kind-hearted spirit Ren, who decides to make him truly happy by getting his parents back together.

programme.title: Heads For Sale
programme.desc: Hua is an upright and brave swordswoman who will stand up against villains and do anything for Luo, the man she loves. When Luo is sent to jail by the corrupted police, she sets out to free him and did not hesitate to chop off two bodyguards’ heads. In the process, she also stumbles across an old enemy of her father who is back seeking revenge.

programme.title: Sons Of Good Earth
programme.desc: This is an epic tale set during the time of the Sino-Japanese war. A painter Yu saves a young girl, Lotus, who is being sold to a brothel. They fall in love, get married and settled in to a peaceful life. However, their life is soon shattered by the Japanese invasion and the brutal regime that follows.

programme.title: Ambitious Kung Fu Girl
programme.desc: The lovely Michelle Mei Suet plays a spoiled girl Szu-szu who ignores her true love Yang Fan (Yuan Te) to go off in search of a swordsman Chin Ko (Chen Kuan-tai) she idolizes. The search sets off one great action scene after another, until she's threatened to be sold into slavery but Yang Fan arrives in the nick of time! This amusing and entertaining variation on the standard kung-fu film is definitely a winner.

programme.title: Black Magic
programme.desc: Hsu Lo is up against an evil black magic practitioner San Kan Mi, who wants to place a death spell on him and a love spell on his fiancée Wang Chu Ying. Fortunately, Wang's friends manage to find another veteran witch doctor to take on the evil San. This bone-chilling tale of good versus evil races to a heart-stopping ending.

programme.title: Cat Vs Rat
programme.desc: Jien Chiu and Bai Yu Tong are equally matched rivals in martial arts. Bai saves the emperor one day but did not believe his identity. Jien rescues the emperor later and gets promoted to the royal guard. This angers Bai and he attempts to jeopardize Jien’s position by stealing the imperial jade seal. Luckily, Jien is able to reclaim the seal with his skills.

programme.title: The Human Goddess
programme.desc: This is a love story between an alluring fairy, Seventh Sister, who comes down from heaven to experience life in 70’s Hong Kong, and a man who is running a debt laden orphanage. A heartless tycoon plans to take over the orphanage for its land but has to deal with Seventh Sister’s magical powers as she aims to protect it from falling into his hands!

programme.title: The Flag Of Iron
programme.desc: When super director Chang Cheh found new talent and blood with "The Five Venoms" actors, most of which were trained in the highly acrobatic Chinese opera and well versed with exotic martial arts weapons, this created a new spark for his use of bizarre weapons in his films. The Flag Of Iron is one of 20 movies that he directed featuring the utterly flabbergasting and physically exhausting action bits created by these five dudes. You have the good guys from the righteous clan versus the bad guys from the villainous clan and it's so filled with "don't-blink-or-you-will-miss-something" gags, you will need to watch it over and over again so you can see the things you missed.

programme.title: The Shadow Boxing
programme.desc: Chan and his apprentice Fan transport vampires for a living. In their most recent job, they are hired to transport nine zombies at one go. When two of them hopped away, it is revealed that one of them is actually a man in disguise trying to escape from his enemies. It turns out that the fake zombie and Chan are both martial arts experts!

programme.title: Fangs Of The Cobra
programme.desc: Incredibly, the title serpent is not a harbinger of horror, but actually the film's hero. This virtuous viper sniffs out bombs, fights gangs, battles a baby-killing rodent and even takes on a duplicitous woman. This one-of-a-kind thriller will be applauded by reptile fans everywhere.

programme.title: Purple Darts
programme.desc: A girl vows to take revenge for her parents who were murdered by four outlaws when she was only a baby. To do so, she trains hard at martial arts and teams up with a swordsman and a couple to finally kill them all.

programme.title: Let'S Fall In Love
programme.desc: Da Yung is the son of an entrepreneur of a big corporation. Lian Lian is the niece of a Kindergarten’s principal. Fate has brought them together as Da Yung loses his wallet by mistake when they first met. Further misunderstanding occurs when Da Yung tries to use Lian Lian as an excuse to drive the two women he does not love away.

programme.title: My Young Auntie
programme.desc: An elderly landowner marries the young Dai Nan to keep his inheritance away from his unscrupulous nephew before he dies. When Dai Nan brings along the deed to meet his other nephew, a series of amusing incidents happen with this “young” auntie, the nephew and his son. Kara won Best Actress in the first Hong Kong Film Awards for her role as Dai Nan.

programme.title: Sweet And Wild
programme.desc: Fang is a spunky young village girl who is not afraid to fight back against hooligans. She gets into trouble with the biggest hoodlum Tong when she foils his plans with a maid, causing Tong to plot a revenge. Luckily a man whom she is attracted to, Hai, comes in time to her rescue. Can they fight back?

programme.title: Pursuit Of A Killer
programme.desc: The charm of Pursuit Of A Killer lies in the long awaited reunion of Five Venoms duo, Lo Meng and Sun Chien; Lo Meng, who plays a Mainland Chinese criminal escapee to Hong Kong in search of a better life, and a cop (Sun Chien) who helps him adjust to Hong Kong life while tracking down his mysterious killer at the same time.

programme.title: My Son
programme.desc: Kuo, a police’s son, blames his father for his mother’s death. He has no job, spends time in night clubs and always gets into fights. One night, Kuo rescues Mei from being raped and they become friends. Kuo wants to support Mei and her family so he goes gambling hoping to gain more money but bad luck seems to be following them with tragic outcomes.

programme.title: The Condemned
programme.desc: Yang Lin is a righteous hero who helps an unjustly imprisoned swordsman accused of stealing. They break out of prison together, and warn all evil men they know to watch out for a new deadly duo in town.

programme.title: Boxer Rebellion
programme.desc: The Empress Dowager Cixi believes the Boxers’ claim that they have developed a kung fu that makes them impervious to weapons, thus declaring war against the alliances of eight foreign nations. The lack of weapons and good leadership in the Ching government allows the Eight Nation Alliances to take down Beijing.

programme.title: Brothers From The Walled City
programme.desc: Two orphaned brothers growing up in Kowloon's Walled City - the place where people are forced to live with indecent businesses of sex, gambling and drugs controlled by triads - take very different life paths. Chin works at a cabaret but keeps away from sins, while Kang is drawn to the sleazy underworld. Are their destinies shaped by the “walls”?

programme.title: Asia-Pol
programme.desc: Asiapol agent Yang Ming Xuan trails a shipment of contraband gold being delivered to gang leader, George Eaton. He enlists the help of a Chinese woman who is trying to avenge her sister and narrowly escapes several deadly traps as he closes in on Eaton's location. This spy film is loosely inspired by the James Bond movies.

programme.title: Killer Constable
programme.desc: Kuei Chih-hung was famous for his modern day crime thrillers, his horror flicks, and even his comedies. But if the only kung-fu film he ever made was this one, he’d still be spoken of with respect by even the most ardent martial arts movie fan. Many consider this real life martial arts champion Chen Kuan-tai’s best performance. As a deeply, even obsessively, dedicated Chief Court Constable, he illuminates the screen with fighting skill and emotional passion. Award winning actor Ku Feng is his equal, playing an especially homicidal robber-chief who thinks nothing of throwing all his men at their relentless pursuer. Lu Tsun and Huang Pei-chi choreograph the many battles featuring such action stalwarts as Pai Piao and Ai Fei.

programme.title: My Rebellious Son
programme.desc: The venerated Sun Chung made many different kinds of films for Shaw Brothers, including popular and renowned satirical comedies, contemporary action dramas, and magnificent martial arts movies. This is one of his last of the latter for the studio, so he wanted to have fun... and let the audience share it. Toward that end he cast international favorite Alexander Fu Sheng as the title character who keeps testing the patience (and kung-fu skills) of his father, a small town bonesetter and herbal healer played by award-winning character actor Ku Feng. But when a local dignitary not only smuggles drugs but plans to give a Chinese treasure away to evil outsiders, the father and son unite to take on foreign fighters and even Japanese ninja in a non-stop display of comic action prowess.

programme.title: Dawn Will Come
programme.desc: Liang Cai drugged the beautiful Qiu Rong and raped her, but promised to marry her after getting his parent’s consent. Since then, there is no news of his proposal and Qiu Rong confronts Liang Cai when she finds herself pregnant. This is when she discovers that he has already married a rich noble girl and even plans to kill her…

programme.title: Shadow Girl
programme.desc: A young swordswoman becomes invisible during the day and a monster at night after taking her grandma’s pill. She ruined the wedding of a bandit chief’s daughter using her powers and is hunted down by them for revenge. Will she escape the hunt?

programme.title: Song Of Orchid Island
programme.desc: Dr. He moves to the remote Lanyu island off the coast of Taiwan to look for his long lost father, and starts to run a clinic curing islanders who are bitten by the fatal red worms there. He meets Ya Lan who works as a nurse in his clinic and falls in love with him. Things get vicious for Dr. He as a jealous islander plots to get rid of him…

programme.title: New Tales Of The Flying Fox
programme.desc: In a great rendition of The Silver Fox and Legend of the Fox comes this exciting adventure, where the only thing between the clan leaders and certain death is Hui Ying-hung.

programme.title: Emperor Chien Lung And The Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung meets a famous courtesan in Suzhou and in order to spend as much time as possible with her, he builds a direct underground tunnel into the Forbidden City. The emperor’s sudden appearances through this direct access shock his people but it is also at this time that he helps the needy and cracks the gambling business in Suzhou.

programme.title: Golden Swallow
programme.desc: A heroine finds herself in a love triangle with a swordsman and a warrior. They team up to conquer the evil forces of the martial arts world. However, she is caught between both men whom she admires when facing a deadly duel.

programme.title: The 82 Tenants
programme.desc: Continuing the success of the classic comedy “House of 72 tenants”, this sequel tells the stories of tenants living in an old building in Hong Kong who are forced to evict by the developers. Some tenants prefer to take the compensation while some resist the move. Will the acquisitions plan destroy the harmony of the neighborhood?

programme.title: The Hidden Power Of Dragon Sabre
programme.desc: Defeated villain Sung Ching Shu returns and starts a reign of terror, trapping a beautiful Mongolian Princess and mastering the "yin and yang combination" to become almost invincible. Only two swords held by two great swordsmen can stand in his way!

programme.title: Spring Blossoms
programme.desc: Some of Shaw Brothers' biggest female stars of the 1970s share the screen in this tale of young love and interfering parents, starring Lily Li, Shu Pei Pei and Essie Lin Chia.

programme.title: The Black Tavern
programme.desc: This sword-filled thriller centres on The Black Tavern – an inn where the down and dirty meet to plot nefarious doings. A bunch of villains are lured to the inn by a rumour about a valuable treasure being hidden there. After all the backstabbing and killings, they realise that it is a trap created to wipe them out once and for all…

programme.title: Endrendum Punnagai
programme.desc: Three best friends, Gautham, Baby and Sri, decide to stay single all their lives. But Baby and Sri get married and Gautham is left alone until Priya comes into his life.

programme.title: Maapla Singam
programme.desc: Mapla Singam is a rural comedy about two families in a village that are in constant conflict with each other.

programme.title: Sowkarpet
programme.desc: The story is about two lovers who are murdered by villains. They come back as ghosts and start taking revenge on the people who killed them.

programme.title: Sivalinga
programme.desc: Raheem gets killed when he tries to save a blind man in a train. When the police close the case stating suicide, Raheem's girlfriend asks Shivalingeshwaran, a CID officer, to investigate the death.

programme.title: Ivan Thanthiran
programme.desc: Two engineering dropouts stumble upon the activities of a corrupt education minister owning engineering colleges and expose him. The minister wants revenge and launches a manhunt for them. The cat-and-mouse game begins.

programme.title: Irumugan
programme.desc: The film was a box-office success and was dubbed in a couple of languages.The story revolves around Akhilan, an ex-RAW agent who is assigned the task to track down the culprit who is responsible for the attack on Indian Embassy in Malaysia.

programme.title: Dikilona
programme.desc: When Mani, a lineworker who is unhappy in his marriage, manages to make a time machine work due to an accident, he goes back in time to change his life.

programme.title: Adhe Kangal
programme.desc: Varun Murali, a blind chef and owner of a restaurant, falls in love with his customer Deepa. However, his life takes an unusual turn after he realises the truth about her.

programme.title: Priest
programme.desc: A priest and a police officer are trying to solve a set of mysterious suicides. As their investigation closes in, they discover another crime with even farther-reaching consequences.

programme.title: Kedi Billa Killadi Ranga
programme.desc: The story of two loafing friends, who want to enter politics.

programme.title: Kesava
programme.desc: A student with a rare heart disease has to seek revenge by controlling his anger.

programme.title: V - The Movie
programme.desc: A celebrated police officer's run of success is shockingly interrupted by V, a mysterious killer, who specifically challenges him to end his killing spree.

programme.title: Sisters
programme.desc: A girl who has lost her parents is facing the issue of pursuing an independent life or raising her younger brother.

programme.title: Kadaisi Nodigal (Forensic)
programme.desc: When a psychotic murderer sets out on a killing spree, a medico-legal advisor uses his forensic skills to unravel the truth behind the heinous deeds.

programme.title: Varappogum 24 Manikkul
programme.desc: Three fugitives barge into a couple's house while escaping the authorities. However, they are flummoxed after finding the wife concealing a murder that has transpired in her home.

programme.title: Silu Karupatti
programme.desc: An anthology of four romantic stories revolving around people of different age groups where the only true thing binding them all together is love.

programme.title: Dangal
programme.desc: After his failure at winning a gold medal for the country, Mahavir Phogat vows to realise his dreams by training his daughters for the Commonwealth Games despite societal pressures.

programme.title: Mannar Vagereya
programme.desc: Madhi helps his brother Arivu unite with the love of his life, which causes trouble between the families. When Madhi tells his parents about the woman he loves, they disapprove of his relationship.

programme.title: Marainthirunthu Paarkum Marmam Enna
programme.desc: A group of chain snatchers hatch an elaborate plan to carry out their operation. They target women and children but must ensure that they do not get caught.

programme.title: Nota
programme.desc: A bachelor who is unaware of the political world is appointed a Chief Minister when his corrupt father retires.

programme.title: Dashing Kundi

programme.title: Gollu Aur Pappu

programme.title: Mera Dost Hanuman
programme.desc: Lord Hanuman descends on Earth to help his devotees, Chandar and Sugna, fight against the evil forces that are trying to harm their children.

programme.title: Global Baba

programme.title: Shatru

programme.title: Mental

programme.title: Judaai
programme.desc: To honour his late father's will, Shashikant and Gauri get married and soon have a son. However, marital problems arise when she starts suspecting him of having an affair with his ex-girlfriend.

programme.title: Judaai
programme.desc: To honour his late father's will, Shashikant and Gauri get married and soon have a son. However, marital problems arise when she starts suspecting him of having an affair with his ex-girlfriend.

programme.title: ACP Shiva
programme.desc: Shivakumar, a dishonest cop, ensures that he is transferred to Chennai, where he exploits his position for financial gain. He also supports GK, a local MP, against the commissioner of Chennai.

programme.title: Sanam Bewafa
programme.desc: Two families that are traditional rivals are shocked when their children fall in love with each other. After great difficulty, the households agree to the marriage, but things do not go as planned.

programme.title: Action Replayy
programme.desc: A son tries to revive his parents' lifeless marriage by travelling back in time to the '70s when their romance was budding. But to his surprise, it turns out to be more complex than he had expected.

programme.title: Trikon Ka Chauta Kon

programme.title: One By Two

programme.title: Feet Up With The Stars
programme.desc: The host interacts with celebrities about their work and personal life. Meanwhile, the guests also reveal certain secrets about themselves and indulge in gossip.

programme.title: Beqabu
programme.desc: Raja helps imprison a terrorist who then murders him. Years later, Raja's girlfriend comes across his lookalike in Nepal and decides to find the truth.

programme.desc: An aging thief hopes to retire and live off his ill-gotten wealth when a young kid convinces him into doing one last heist.

programme.desc: You're the Indian Now - John helps Tate overcome the torment of his captivity, while the Dutton's watch over their cattle away from the ranch. A new group of slick financiers threatens the Dutton's ranch.

programme.title: Yellowstone (S3) Ep2
programme.desc: Freight Trains and Monsters - The Duttons each in their own way adjust to their new settings. John continues bonding with his grandson in the bucolic setting. Beth meets the Duttons' new brash adversary.

programme.title: Yellowstone (S3) Ep3
programme.desc: An Acceptable Surrender - John gives Tate some life advice on the pitfalls of being a rancher in the modern age. Newly appointed Attorney General Jamie concocts an alibi for his new defendant, and then begins witness tampering.

programme.title: Yellowstone (S3) Ep4
programme.desc: Going Back to Cali - Biker gangs add to threats the Duttons face. Beth escalates her fight against the financial adversary trying to take over their property, while John enlists Governor Perry's help.

programme.title: Yellowstone (S3) Ep5
programme.desc: Cowboys and Dreamers - While the Dutton's settle into their new roles, a nemesis from John's past appears. Beth continues her spat with Roarke, as his company threatens to buy up the Dutton's land.

programme.title: Yellowstone (S3) Ep6
programme.desc: All for Nothing - An old Dutton nemesis returns to Yellowstone. Kayce and Monica assist Rainwater with a troubling situation. The financiers target the Dutton family unity.

programme.title: Yellowstone (S3) Ep7
programme.desc: The Beating - Jamie stumbles upon unsettling news about his past, while Kayce tracks a cattle rustler. Beth joins forces with a lawyer to help stave off the corporate raiders closing in.

programme.title: Yellowstone (S3) Ep8
programme.desc: I Killed a Man Today - Beth fires back against their financial adversary by shorting their stock, sending it plummeting. Monica assists authorities as missing person cases start mounting. Wade sends John Dutton a message.

programme.title: Yellowstone (S3) Ep9
programme.desc: Meaner Than Evil - A forgotten drifter returns to Yellowstone. Rattled by recent events, the ranchers seek revenge. The financiers plot their next move.

programme.title: Yellowstone (S3) Ep10
programme.desc: The World is Purple - Beth and Rip deliberate right and wrong, good and evil. The Duttons are forced into a tense standoff with their corporate nemesis. Thomas Rainwater receives some uncomfortable counsel.

programme.desc: When mysterious thieves set their sights on the Sierra Nugget Mall's prized silver nugget, the department vows to stand watch while performing their annual Junior Deputy Christmas Pageant.

programme.title: Most Ridiculous (S3) Ep15
programme.desc: Action Heroes - The series with funniest clips from the internet is back - and this time it's Action Heroes getting the Most Ridiculous treatment. Greg James bring us silly show-offs, stupid stunts and terrible tricks.

programme.title: Drunk History (S6) Ep16
programme.desc: Bad Blood - Mary Mallon spreads typhoid fever wherever she goes, and Cleopatra's younger sister Arsinoe schemes her way in and out of power in Ancient Egypt.

programme.title: Scream 2
programme.desc: While away at college, Sidney Prescott thought she'd finally put the terror behind her, until a copycat killer begins acting out a real-life sequel in which no one is safe, or beyond suspicion.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans (S1) Ep22
programme.desc: How Much Pain Can You Take? - To send a message to Pride, Baitfish murders someone close to the NCIS team, prompting a citywide manhunt for the elusive criminal. Dylan Walsh guest stars.

programme.title: For Heaven's Sake (S1) Ep4
programme.desc: The Town - Would-be detectives Mike and Jackson question how seriously the town of Minden took Harold's disappearance decades ago and begin to interview descendants of his neighbors and peers.

programme.title: Most Ridiculous (S3) Ep15
programme.desc: Action Heroes - The series with funniest clips from the internet is back - and this time it's Action Heroes getting the Most Ridiculous treatment. Greg James bring us silly show-offs, stupid stunts and terrible tricks.

programme.title: Top Gun
programme.desc: A daring yet reckless pilot who shuns teamwork and the rules of engagement eventually learns the importance of cooperation and discipline.

programme.title: Duplex
programme.desc: A young couple (Ben Stiller and Drew Barrymore) have a chance to move into a gorgeous duplex in a perfect New York neighbourhood. All they have to do is bump off a cute little old lady. (2003)

programme.title: The Daily Show (S28) Ep24
programme.desc: Trevor Noah and The Daily Show correspondents tackle the biggest stories in news, politics and pop culture.

programme.title: Star Trek: Discovery (S4) Ep13
programme.desc: Coming Home - With evacuations underway, Burnham and the team aboard the U.S.S. Discovery must find a way to communicate and connect with a species far different from their own before time runs out.

programme.title: 1883 (S1) Ep2
programme.desc: Behind Us, A Cliff - Thomas and Shea recruit James and some local cowboys to corral a herd of cattle. As they begin their journey, the caravan is confronted with some of the many dangers they will face along the way.

programme.title: Saturday Night Live (S48) Ep1
programme.desc: Miles Teller / Kendrick Lamar - Your host tonight Miles Teller with musical performance by Kendrick Lamar

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: The world needed a hero, we got a hedgehog. Superpowered with speed, Sonic races to save the world and stop evil genius Dr. Robotnik from world domination.

programme.title: The Daily Show (S28) Ep25
programme.desc: Trevor Noah and The Daily Show correspondents tackle the biggest stories in news, politics and pop culture.

programme.title: The Kite Runner
programme.desc: Amir is a young Afghani from a well-to-do Kabul family; his best friend Hassan is the son of a family servant. Together the two boys form a bond of friendship that breaks tragically on one fateful day.

programme.title: Trevor Noah Presents: Josh Johnson
programme.desc: Josh Johnson discusses pandemic-era absurdities, his terrifying encounter with bees, relearning how to be in the world as an avowed weirdo and getting hit on by his friend's grandma.

programme.title: Teaching Mrs. Tingle
programme.desc: A high schooler will do anything to become the valedictorian of her school, even if that means committing murder.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans (S1) Ep23
programme.desc: My City - Pride suspects a mole among the ranks as NCIS and local law enforcement continue to track the Broussard Syndicate after new intelligence suggests a breach at the ports.

programme.title: For Heaven's Sake (S1) Ep4
programme.desc: The Town - Would-be detectives Mike and Jackson question how seriously the town of Minden took Harold's disappearance decades ago and begin to interview descendants of his neighbors and peers.

programme.title: Star Trek: Discovery (S4) Ep13
programme.desc: Coming Home - With evacuations underway, Burnham and the team aboard the U.S.S. Discovery must find a way to communicate and connect with a species far different from their own before time runs out.

programme.title: It's Your Turn, Honey!
programme.desc: In this dark satire, a divorced couple fight over who has custody of their children. Both have glittering career prospects abroad and each tries, with hilarious result, to convince their children that they are better off with the other parent.

programme.title: Super Kipli
programme.desc: Zilkifli needs to pay for the security deposit for a job he so desperately needs. To do so, he borrows a car to open a passenger shuttle route. However, he faces many setbacks and complications in his effort to do so.

programme.title: Take It Or Leave It
programme.desc: 30-year-old construction worker Erik suddenly finds himself a single parent when his ex-girlfriend, whom he hasn’t seen for six months, has a baby girl and informs him that she’ll put the child up for adoption unless he wants to take care of his daughter.

programme.title: My Daughter On The Run
programme.desc: When the police deem her daughter’s runaway case as not a priority, Jeanne has to look for her daughter by herself. Jeanne begins a journey into hell, as she learns that her daughter has become a stranger to her.

programme.title: Hacker
programme.desc: Benjamin is a 13-year-old orphan and hacking enthusiast. One day, he discovers that, contrary to what he was told, his mother didn’t die in an accident years ago. In his conquest to locate her, he provokes the ire of the Danish Secret Service.

programme.title: Love In The Skies
programme.desc: In this mile-high romantic comedy, Charlotte is an air stewardess who enjoys singlehood and her jet set lifestyle. But her life changes drastically when she falls for a charming passenger whilst simultaneously helping her best friend raise her new-born.

programme.title: DNA Episode 1
programme.desc: When a little girl disappears in Copenhagen, forensic clues point to a kidnapper in Poland. Inspector Rolf travels there with an unlikely partner – his baby daughter. But tragedy strikes when his daughter suddenly disappears from her pram on the ferry.

programme.title: DNA Episode 2
programme.desc: Inspector Rolf tries to find a car thief by matching DNA to possible suspects. His assistant Neel discovers that the thief isn’t on the registry and this prompts Rolf to reflect on the unsolved disappearance of his own baby daughter 5 years ago.

programme.title: The Tower
programme.desc: Based on true stories retold by Palestinian refugees, this animation focuses on 11 year-old Wardi’s life in a Lebanese camp. One day, her beloved great-grandfather entrusts her with his most prized possession – the key to their ancestral house in Galilea.

programme.title: Balancing Act
programme.desc: Marie has it all – a loving family and a successful career. However, her world comes crashing when she’s diagnosed with multiple sclerosis. As she struggles to come to terms with the trauma, she learns to accept help from others and find the silver lining.

programme.title: Aurora
programme.desc: In this black comedy, a sanatorium isolated in the mountains becomes a microcosm of Kyrgyzstan; its residents comprise of a tourist, a TV host, a pervert, Chinese businessmen and drugged-up youths. Excised in linear time, reality dissolves into fantasy.

programme.title: It's Your Turn, Honey!
programme.desc: In this dark satire, a divorced couple fight over who has custody of their children. Both have glittering career prospects abroad and each tries, with hilarious result, to convince their children that they are better off with the other parent.

programme.title: My Daughter On The Run
programme.desc: When the police deem her daughter’s runaway case as not a priority, Jeanne has to look for her daughter by herself. Jeanne begins a journey into hell, as she learns that her daughter has become a stranger to her.

programme.title: DNA Episode 1
programme.desc: When a little girl disappears in Copenhagen, forensic clues point to a kidnapper in Poland. Inspector Rolf travels there with an unlikely partner – his baby daughter. But tragedy strikes when his daughter suddenly disappears from her pram on the ferry.

programme.title: DNA Episode 2
programme.desc: Inspector Rolf tries to find a car thief by matching DNA to possible suspects. His assistant Neel discovers that the thief isn’t on the registry and this prompts Rolf to reflect on the unsolved disappearance of his own baby daughter 5 years ago.

programme.title: Dolce Fine Giornata
programme.desc: In Tuscany, Polish Nobel Prize winner Maria's stable family life begins to erode as her relationship with a young immigrant develops against a backdrop of terrorism and eroding democracy.

programme.title: Love In The Skies
programme.desc: In this mile-high romantic comedy, Charlotte is an air stewardess who enjoys singlehood and her jet set lifestyle. But her life changes drastically when she falls for a charming passenger whilst simultaneously helping her best friend raise her new-born.

programme.title: Equilibrium
programme.desc: Giuseppe is a priest who’s replacing the bishop of a small town near Naples. He is given the dangerous task of prohibiting the illegal dumping of industrial waste by the mafia. But his spiritual faith is tested as the dangers of his task start mounting.

programme.title: Balancing Act
programme.desc: Marie has it all – a loving family and a successful career. However, her world comes crashing when she’s diagnosed with multiple sclerosis. As she struggles to come to terms with the trauma, she learns to accept help from others and find the silver lining.

programme.title: Penny Bank
programme.desc: Middle aged Orhan is struggling with every aspect of his life: he has to take care of his comatose mother, he is in debt, he cannot fulfill his role as a father, and he has to juggle multiple jobs. Eventually, he has to make an impossible decision…

programme.title: The Tower
programme.desc: Based on true stories retold by Palestinian refugees, this animation focuses on 11 year-old Wardi’s life in a Lebanese camp. One day, her beloved great-grandfather entrusts her with his most prized possession – the key to their ancestral house in Galilea.

programme.title: My Little Sister
programme.desc: Set in Russia during WWII, little Yamil impatiently awaits the day that his father, whom he has never seen, can return home from battle. One day, mother brings home a traumatized orphan girl Oksana. Yamil finds comfort and hope in loving her as a sister.

programme.title: DNA Episode 3
programme.desc: Rolf digs for new DNA material in a bid to uncover more details about the two girls’ disappearances. However, the results of the investigation by Vidt, the officer who took over the case from Rolf, has mysteriously vanished.

programme.title: DNA Episode 4
programme.desc: The reopened case of Minna leads Rolf to a witness who has a recorded video of her with some young people in Poland. As investigations gain traction, Rolf digs deeper into his own daughter’s disappearance and another girl in France mysteriously disappears.

programme.title: Clay Pit
programme.desc: It’s the 90s in Russia. Mila has returned home to a remote Russian town after failing to “make it in Moscow” while her sister is about to wed Rustam, a charming young man. But when Rustam becomes the centre of conflicting passions, terrible chaos ensues.

programme.title: Baby Boom
programme.desc: Four couples experience the ups and downs of pregnancy. In an IVF clinic, there’s been a mix-up between 2 couples while the owners realise they’re going to be parents again in their 40s. Meanwhile, Liane wants a baby but her partner is commitment-phobic.

programme.title: Dolce Fine Giornata
programme.desc: In Tuscany, Polish Nobel Prize winner Maria's stable family life begins to erode as her relationship with a young immigrant develops against a backdrop of terrorism and eroding democracy.

programme.title: Equilibrium

programme.title: DNA Episode 4
programme.desc: The reopened case of Minna leads Rolf to a witness who has a recorded video of her with some young people in Poland. As investigations gain traction, Rolf digs deeper into his own daughter’s disappearance and another girl in France mysteriously disappears.

programme.title: Kuma
programme.desc: After being tricked into becoming the second wife of a Turkish man in Vienna, the naïve Ayse accepts her fate and even develops a close friendship with Fatma, the first wife. With Fatma dying of cancer, Ayse has to take over her marital duties.

programme.title: My Little Sister
programme.desc: Set in Russia during WWII, little Yamil impatiently awaits the day that his father, whom he has never seen, can return home from battle. One day, mother brings home a traumatized orphan girl Oksana. Yamil finds comfort and hope in loving her as a sister.

programme.title: Domingo
programme.desc: The historic election of Brazilian president Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva is seen from the perspective of a provincial bourgeois family. His inauguration deeply troubles the family, as they worry about their authority and wealth in this new administration.

programme.title: Clay Pit
programme.desc: It’s the 90s in Russia. Mila has returned home to a remote Russian town after failing to “make it in Moscow” while her sister is about to wed Rustam, a charming young man. But when Rustam becomes the centre of conflicting passions, terrible chaos ensues.

programme.title: In The Heart Of The World
programme.desc: In a poor Brazilian neighbourhood, its many inhabitants struggle to make ends meet. Everyone yearns for a happier future where life isn’t only about unforgiving survival – petty crime, big crime, anything that pays becomes a pathway of hope.

programme.title: Baby Boom
programme.desc: Four couples experience the ups and downs of pregnancy. In an IVF clinic, there’s been a mix-up between 2 couples while the owners realise they’re going to be parents again in their 40s. Meanwhile, Liane wants a baby but her partner is commitment-phobic.

programme.title: Thou Shalt Not Hate
programme.desc: Simone is an established surgeon and son of a holocaust survivor. After refusing to save a victim of a traffic accident with a swastika tattoo, he must grapple with the guilt he feels from his decision.

programme.title: DNA Episode 5
programme.desc: Investigations take a sinister turn when further investigations points Rolf to a monastery in Southern Poland. He soon realises that he’s possibly looking at a complex international child trafficking network, where religion is far from virtuous.

programme.title: DNA Episode 6
programme.desc: Rolf discovers that the monastery illegally supplies babies to an online organisation called “Bliss”. He travels to Paris to investigate a celebrity couple who he suspects have used “Bliss” and soon find revealing connections to his daughter and Minna’s cases.

programme.title: Golden Men
programme.desc: Based on a true story. A star-studded heist film with a comedic edge, Golden Men follows a group of desperate men in Turin who attempt an armoured truck robbery.

programme.title: Super Kipli
programme.desc: Zilkifli needs to pay for the security deposit for a job he so desperately needs. To do so, he borrows a car to open a passenger shuttle route. However, he faces many setbacks and complications in his effort to do so.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S15 3
programme.desc: Pull back the curtain on 20 of the dumbest performers ever to take the stage - from an angry Elmo to a lion trainer who almost becomes dinner and a woman who crushes watermelons. They all get harsh reviews from celebrities like Danny Bonaduce and Leif Garrett, plus hot comics like Mike Trainor.

programme.title: DC's Legends Of Tomorrow S6 7
programme.desc: With Ava a wreck, Behrad and the Legends make a last-ditch effort to keep Sara from being abducted in the first place, even knowing that it will alter the timeline.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S8 10
programme.desc: As Sheldon records the final installment of 'Fun with Flags' Bernadette is shocked to learn of her co-workers' true feelings from Penny.

programme.title: Friends S4 10
programme.desc: Ross struggles to maintain a long-distance relationship. Chandler tries to get a date for Rachel. Monica schemes to establish authority at her new restaurant job.

programme.title: DC's Legends Of Tomorrow S5 9
programme.desc: Sara, Constantine and Charlie find themselves in British Columbia searching for another piece of the Loom, but they run into a problem they couldn't have foreseen.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 2
programme.desc: The competition heats up as Brandon and Lori find themselves in an all out bidding war with the tough-talking Taylor brothers. Amidst the chaos, Jesse goes all-in for a locker that could be hiding an expert marksman's rare weapons. And later, Sean unveils a bin whose stench is so rancid it sends the buyers running. But when one of our competitors takes a gamble, the entire group is blown away by the score.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S4 11
programme.desc: Michael feeds a cannibalistic plant at a garden center, and at the tuxedo store, he sells a tie that literally suits itself. Plus, at a hockey rink, Michael's assistant is speechless with a trick so electric it melts the ice!

programme.desc: Series premiere: Boston detective Jane Rizzoli (ANGIE HARMON) and medical examiner Maura Isles (SASHA ALEXANDER) investigate a murder that mimics the Surgeon, a serial killer.

programme.title: Veronica Mars S1 1
programme.desc: In the wealthy, seaside community of Neptune, the rich and powerful make the rules. They own the town and the high school, and they desperately try to keep their dirty little secrets just that...secret. Unfortunately for them, there's Veronica Mars (series star KRISTEN BELL), a smart, fearless 17-year-old apprentice private investigator dedicated to solving the town's toughest mysteries.

programme.title: DC's Legends Of Tomorrow S5 11
programme.desc: Everyone is eager to use the Loom of Fate, but the team must decide who they want to bring back first, leaving Charlie to make a tough choice.

programme.title: Rizzoli & Isles S1 2
programme.desc: Tensions are high as the squad investigates a possible copycat of the Boston Strangler. Jane butts heads with her new boss, Lieutenant Grant (recurring guest star DONNIE WAHLBERG).

programme.title: Veronica Mars S1 2
programme.desc: Veronica and Wallace don't believe in the evidence against Weevil, who has been arrested for stealing credit card applications from Logan's family, and launch an investigation to help their new ally. Meanwhile, after joining Ms. Mallory Dent's (series star SYDNEY TAMIIA POITIER) journalism class, Veronica clashes with socialite Caitlin Ford (PARIS HILTON - "The Simple Life 2"), Logan's sexy new girlfriend. The young investigator is intrigued by the attention shown to her by another wealthy student, Troy Vandegraff (recurring guest star AARON ASHMORE), a friend of her ex-boyfriend Duncan. Later, Veronica learns that Lilly got a ticket while driving her car on the day she died--two hours after her supposed time of death.

programme.title: DC's Stargirl S2 9
programme.desc: As Eclipso takes aim, Pat is reminded of painful memories from his past with the original JSA and their fight to take down Eclipso. JOHN WESLEY SHIPP guest stars as Jay Garrick.

programme.title: Blindspot S5 8
programme.desc: As Madeline and Ivy (Julee Cerda) close in on the location of the bunker, the team realizes that someone on the inside is feeding information to Madeline.

programme.title: DC's Legends Of Tomorrow S5 11
programme.desc: Everyone is eager to use the Loom of Fate, but the team must decide who they want to bring back first, leaving Charlie to make a tough choice.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 4
programme.desc: Our buyers throw down to score a locker packed with rare movie memorabilia. Then, Papa Bear and T-Money each scoop up low-grade bins, but when they each start to sift through their individual messes, one of them finds a childhood dream-come-true. Andlater, the day's final auction sparks an intense bidding war, but when one of our buyers shoots the moon on his bid, it leaves everyone else wondering exactly where all of this cash is coming from.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S4 13
programme.desc: While working in a cheese store, Michael milks the reaction of a woman stunned by breeding brie. Later, Michael nails down the perfect app in a salon and unpacks a trick in an airport that ruffles his assistant's feathers.

programme.title: Superman & Lois S1 10
programme.desc: Lana reaches out to Lois and Clark when Kyle starts behaving strangely. Meanwhile, Jonathan opens up to Jordan. Lastly, Sarah storms out after accusing her mom of always covering for her dad.

programme.desc: Following three inter-Korean summits and two North Korea-U.S. summits, a journey towards peace on the Korean Peninsula has become irreversible. 2019 will see countless twists and turns in negotiations, as all parties involved work to build a lasting peace in search for a winning solution for all. No longer a simply political, abstract notion, peace is now an imperative that leads to the prosperity of the Korean Peninsula and the international community. programme.desc: NCIS is more than just an action drama. With liberal doses of humor, it's a show that focuses on the sometimes complex and always amusing dynamics of a team forced to work together in high-stress situations.

programme.title: John Grisham's The Rainmaker

programme.desc: Inside The Factory XL: Buses - The red double-decker bus is a global icon. They carry millions of passengers every day across the capital and are as synonymous with London as Tower Bridge and Buckingham Palace. Now, Gregg Wallace has special access to a factory in Scarborough, Yorkshire, where they build this famous people mover.

programme.title: Snow Animals
programme.desc: Liz Bonnin introduces a cast of charismatic animals to reveal the remarkable strategies they use to survive, and even thrive, through the winter.

programme.title: Food Factory S3 Ep15
programme.desc: See the mass production of curly fries, plus red velvet cakes with cream cheese frosting, vegetable pot pies, and marshmallow squares covered in vanilla caramel.

programme.title: Food Factory S3 Ep16
programme.desc: Fish fingers are covered with batter and bread crumbs; puffed corn meal is coated with caramel; creating crinkle-cut sweet potato fries; and cookie dough batter is frozen, then smothered in chocolate.

programme.title: Wild China S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Heart of The Dragon - With splendour, scale and romance, Wild China lifts the veil on the world's most enigmatic and magnificent country, delving into its vibrant habitats to reveal a land of unbelievable natural complexity. Journey across China from the glittering peaks of the Himalayas to the barren steppe, the sub-Arctic to the tropical islands, through deserts both searingly hot and mind-numbingly cold and see, in pioneering images, a dazzling array of mysterious, beautiful, wild and rare creatures.

programme.title: Through the Seasons: China S1 Ep1
programme.desc: We follow the people of China from January to April as the Chinese concept of 24 solar terms is explained. After Chinese New Year we witness a stunning Lantern Festival in Nanjing.

programme.title: Expedition with Steve Backshall S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Expedition Unseen - Steve takes on four entirely new adventures to remote parts of the planet - including Saudi Arabia, Gabon and Mexico - in search of precious natural wonders.

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Louisiana - Robson is in America's deep south on the Tennessee River where he catches catfish in his hands. Then he's off to the Gulf of Mexico for blackfin tuna.

programme.desc: Europe - Robson travels Spain, Portugal and the Canary Islands in search of the highly prized blue marlin. He also eats the poisonous escolar fish.

programme.title: After the Wildfires
programme.desc: Charting the long-term recovery of wildlife in the aftermath of Australia’s catastrophic bushfires through stories of hope, human intervention and resilience, this film provides an urgent message to safeguard our environment before it is too late.

programme.title: Land of Gremlins 1 - Castaway Island Ep2
programme.desc: This film travels around the island visiting some of its most striking landscapes to explore how Madagascar’s species have evolved over time. Madagascar is a strangely beautiful and unique world with a staggering array of habitats and special landscapes.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 - The Fickle River Ep1
programme.desc: Travel to Samburu, where matriarch Anastasia turns her elephant herd north after a local river dries up. Then, in Naboisho, see cheetah mom Kuleta evade a crafty pack of hyenas. Later, in Laikipia, check in on wild dog Phoenix and her new litter.

programme.title: Animal Empires 1 - Family Ep1
programme.desc: Every empire needs a succession plan. Making babies – and raising them – is crucial for every species to survive. In some social circles, it takes a village to raise a family. In others, a single parent is all that stands between the vulnerability of yout

programme.title: Animal Empires 1 - Rebuilding an Empire Ep2
programme.desc: Over the course of recorded time, many species have been threatened with extinction. Once-powerful animal empires – like the dinosaurs - have been completely wiped from the planet. But others once on the verge of disappearance have survived, bounced back,

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 - Episode 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Enjoy the spring baby boom at the center as the staff go gaga over an adorable bundle of baby possums. Then see the rescue team hit a rooftop patio for a little R and R: retrieving and rescuing a mama and her ducklings perched high above the city.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - The Next Dynasty Ep6
programme.desc: The all-female Hollywood pride have been in exile after being attacked by the four Nomad brothers. But their leader, Ava, decides to lead her family south to the heart of their territory for a showdown with the Nomads.

programme.title: Weird, Wild & Wonderful
programme.desc: Trek across Africa for a peek at the colorful, quirky survival strategies of its animals. See these furry, feathered, and scaled magicians, from flamboyant flamingos to vanishing lizards, find food, elude predators, and find mates against all odds.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 - Episode 2 Ep2
programme.desc: See staff care for baby bunnies injured in a dog attack and then join the center’s release team as they introduce an abandoned cygnet to an adoptive mother swan, and find that things don’t go exactly as planned.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 - Episode 3 Ep3
programme.desc: Join the search for a Cooper’s hawk who’s taken a dangerous dip in a backyard pool. Catch the hijinks of the centre’s skunks as they try to avoid getting their shots, giving the team a closeup experience with the animals’ stinky natural defences.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 - Episode 4 Ep4
programme.desc: When a baby mink is abandoned in a store, the team gets to work on some behavioural training. But will this sweet little one be tough enough for the wild when they’re done? Visit with a mange-afflicted coyote who’s enjoying some alone time to heal.

programme.title: Rooted 1 - Memoirs of Acacia Ep1
programme.desc: Across rippled dunes, in the wind-swept grasslands of the southern Kalahari towers a magnificent Camelthorn. It has stood here for two centuries. This tree is never lonely, learn how it provides food, shelter and a hunting ground to many creatures.

programme.title: Into the Wild Colombia 1 - The Hummingbird’s Quest Ep2
programme.desc: From Colombia’s high plains of the Páramo to its tropical forests, hummingbirds have evolved into an extraordinary number of species. Whether battling freezing rain or jungle predators, each mother must struggle to build a nest, protect her eggs.

programme.title: Land of Gremlins 1 - Madagascar in Cold Blood Ep3
programme.desc: Explore the lives of Madagascar’s cold-blooded creatures. Chameleons, frog, lizards, and snakes have all adapted in order to survive on the island. We take a look at how they find food, reproduce, and avoid predators.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 - Blood and Dust Ep2
programme.desc: Discover the clever way elephants dig wells, and see the relief that comes with a sudden river-filling downpour. Mourn cheetah Kuleta’s loss after lions kill one of her cubs, and get a front-row seat when wild dog Phoenix faces off with a hyena mob.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 - Episode 5 Ep5
programme.desc: A curious raccoon sticks his head a little too far into a peanut butter jar on a sweltering summer day in Toronto. See how the team gets him out of this sticky situation. Then cheer on a painted turtle who needs emergency eye surgery.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 - Episode 6 Ep6
programme.desc: Follow the medical and rehab teams at Toronto Wildlife Centre as they work to clear a rescued fox of mange and return it to the wild. Elsewhere in the center, meet scores of injured songbirds that have hit downtown buildings on their way south.

programme.title: Rooted 1 - Sweet Seduction Ep2
programme.desc: Discover the story of the much loved Sausage Tree, whose nectar filled blooms and sausage shaped fruits entice animals of all kinds, from insects to elephants. See how the very animals who rely on this generous tree ensure its proliferation.

programme.title: Into the Wild Colombia 1 - Warriors of the Llanos Ep3
programme.desc: The flat savannas of the Colombian Llanos are governed by seasonal extremes that push life to the brink. In this unforgiving arena, there are no second chances, and only creatures best adapted to their brutal extremes will make it through a year.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan 1 - A Wild Education Ep1
programme.desc: Welcome baby orangutan Topan, an orphan in need of a surrogate mom. Watch her learning journey in nursery school while her fellow students move through junior, senior, and wild-immersion schools. Meanwhile, 16-year-old Kasper preps for graduation.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 - Praying for Rain Ep3
programme.desc: Trail Anastasia as her herd splits to protect two precious elephant calves, while Kuleta retakes territory for her remaining cheetah cubs. Join wild dog Phoenix’s search for a new mate as the skies open up and rain begins to heal the parched land.

programme.title: These Woods Are Haunted S3 Ep5
programme.desc: I See It Landing In Our Backyard And I Was Trapped - A Texas man's life is forever changed when a UFO chases him and his father down on a dark rural road.

programme.title: UFO Witness S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Claws In The Night - While thousands of people witness UFOs every year, only a handful claim to have been abducted.

programme.title: Flying Wild Alaska S2 Ep12
programme.desc: New Wings Over Alaska - Join the unconventional Tweto family as they continue to transport life's necessities to one of the most remote and extreme regions of America.

programme.title: Paranormal Lockdown S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Franklin Castle - Nick Groff and Katrina Weidman arrive in Cleveland, Ohio to investigate a Victorian mansion's haunted secrets.

programme.title: World's Greatest Motorcycle Rides S12 Ep3
programme.desc: South Africa - Kuruman To Loerisfontein - The town of Kuruman on the fringes of the Kalahari desert could well be Henry Cole's final resting place only 750 miles into this 3000 mile adventure to Cape Town.

programme.title: Portals To Hell S3 Ep3
programme.desc: Hill View Manor - Jack and Katrina investigate an abandoned nursing home in New Castle, Pennsylvania. They cross paths with a malevolent shadow creature called the Creeper.

programme.title: American Monster S2 Ep1
programme.desc: The Green Monster - In rural Ohio, an intruder brutally guns down Jack and Linda Myers in their sleep. The only witness is their sleepy 4-year-old grandson.

programme.title: Top Secret Swimming Holes S3 Ep12
programme.desc: California's Jolly Boys Mine - We're having a blast at the world's most top-secret swimming holes from California to Puerto Rico.

programme.title: Hotel Impossible S4 Ep7
programme.desc: Resort To Spanking - A passive aggressive owner with no control tests Anthony Melchiorri.
